  Controls the Class.Part.Shape of an object.

  The PartType enum controls the Class.Part.Shape|Shape of a Class.Part.

  - name: Ball
    summary: |
      A spherical shape.

  - name: Block

  - name: Cylinder

  - name: Wedge

  - name: CornerWedge
